website_summaries.verdict: A refreshing spray that calms irritated skin and is perfect for a light moisturizer in the wintertime.
pros: Gives skin a nice, dewy look without leaving it shiny or oily
Rich in antioxidants to help  calm dry or irritated skin
Suitable for use on sensitive skin
cons: Some users have complained that the bottle doesn't last very long

customer_reviews.title: Spray not as good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using thermal spring water spray as long as I can remember. My usual go to is either Avene or Evian. This product popped up in "recommended" feed, so I gave it a try. The spring water itself is fine but the spray mist is not as fine as Avene or Evian. The mist is rather coarse and I didn't like that. I use it after washing my face, but also use it to set my makeup (powder foundation). For that purpose, I want the mist to be very fine. It didn't meet my expectation in that regard. I will go back to my regulars after this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tellurium

customer_reviews.title: Gives my skin a boost of moisture!

I love this stuff! It's the moisture boost my skin needed.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for rosacea!

A quick couple of spritzes and my skin feels cooler and a lot less irritated. It is now my favorite La Roche-Posay product! I highly recommend anyone with rosacea to give this product a try. Amazon does sell this product at a higher price. It is approximately $2 more on Amazon than it is on the company's website for the same size bottle.

product_meta.title: La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water for Sensitive Skin
product_meta.description:
Size:10.5 Fl Oz

Amazon is an authorized retailer of La Roche-Posay products.

La Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water Soothing Face Mist Spray with Antioxidants is essential for soothing face and body for sensitive skin. This water mist spray helps refresh and tone the skin. Thermal Spring Water is at the heart of most La Roche-Posay products. Its unique combination of mineral salts and trace elements has been scientifically demonstrated for its soothing properties and used in Europe for centuries at the center of Thermal Dermatology in the town of La Roche-Posay. Naturally contains a high concentration of Selenium, a powerful natural antioxidant and mineral-rich micro-droplets, which provides immediate, intense soothing. This facial mist spray is:

 * Oil-free
 * Fragrance-free
 * Paraben-free
 * Additive-free

Face mist spray can be used as the last step in cleansing or first step in caring to tone and refresh skin. After a mild cleansing, spray 8 to 12 inches from face then leave on 2-3 minutes. Gently pat off excess spray without rubbing. Use as often as desired, at home, at the office, or on the go. Ingredients: Aqua/Water.

Product packaging may vary.



BRAND STORY
Recommended by 90,000 dermatologists worldwide, La Roche-Posay offers unique daily skincare developed using a strict formulation charter and stringent clinical testing for efficacy and safety, even on sensitive skin.
